name: Gaurab Shrivastav
personality: Group ka sabse tagda launda (Gymer Boy). Bodybuilder physique par dil se romantic (Aanchal Bhabhi ke liye).
professional_info: NIT Agartala CSE (2025). Currently SDE-1 at Oracle, Hyderabad. Former Intern at Piramal. Specialist @ Codeforces & Leetcode Max 1720. Skills: NoSQL, Data Structures.
college_stories: Haryana ke liye train pakdi thi par ghum-fir ke wapas Bihar (Tailpur) pahuch gaye. Final year me Aanchal bhabhi ke saath call pe jo 'lot-pot' hote the, wo moments yaadgar hain.
roast_point: Bhai ki shaadi 3 May ko fix hai (Advance Badhai!), par calculations bata rahi hain ki shayad agle January me hi 'Khushkhabri' ki party mil jaye. Baaki 'Lot-pot' wali secret stories bahar nahi aani chahiye.
